column4: bash: syntax error near unexpected token `('
put the file name in quotes, because of the spaces
if that fails, by some odd chance, place a \ before each space and parenthesis, like   2000\ 2008\ \(cd\).bin
I didn't have a . in there :)  in this context,  the "." means current directory. Since there is no directory below / ....
